name: Under Castle
description:
Under Castle is my 2D Platformer study project.

I made the following modifications to the project template:

  • Player sprite re-skin
  • Enemy sprite re-skin
  • Background tile set re-skin
  • Foreground tile set re-skin
  • Foreground hazard re-skin
  • Pickup, checkpoint, door and goal re-skins
  • Game logo creation
  • UI screen redesigns
  • Removed score and treasure items

Created By KCA
